Hi,

This beta release has not been followed up by subsequent beta releases=
, release candidates or final release. Does this mean that the beta is unst=
able or ... ?

Anyone know when to expect the next official release of H3?
=

- Kris

--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, Gordon Mohr <gojomo@...> w=
rote:
>
> A new test release of Heritrix before our final 3.1.0 release is =
now 
> available. See the following Release Notes page on the project wiki =
for 
> full details:
> 
> https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix=
/Release+Notes+-+Heritrix+3.1.0-beta
> 
> We encourage expert Heritrix user=
s curious about the new version, or
> willing to help with testing, to try =
this beta release and share feedback.
> 
> Our focus over the next couple w=
eeks will be further testing under 
> realistic crawl conditions, and bug f=
ixing.
> 
> As always, problem reports, ideas, fix/feature contributions, a=
nd other
> kinds of feedback are all welcome here on the list and on the pr=
oject
> wiki and JIRA issue tracker:
> 
> Heritrix Wiki: http://webarchive.=
jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix
> Heritrix JIRA: http://webarchive.jira.com/=
browse/HER
> 
> - Gordon @ IA
